text:
Sorry, I just can't
take my eyes off you.

Isn't it crazy?
It's like we're looking at --

It's a mirror.
You are a mirror.

Do you wonder
what it's like to be --

'Cause I'm wondering what
it's like to be up there.

Aren't you wondering
what it's like to be over here?

Because it's like
looking in a mirror.

Yeah.
You know what?
Why don't you play?

You guys want Jameela
to play over here? I'll host.

-No, really?
-Let's go.

-Can you do that?
-Let's go.

Whoa, get over here.
Really? Really?

[ High-pitched British accent ]
Welcome back

to "The Misery Index,"
the game where you can

make a fortune out of
other people's misfortune.
I'm Joe-meela Jamil.

Now in this round I'll show you
both the same event,

and you have to guess where
it lands on The Misery Index.

Get it right
and Bob's your Uncle,

you get 2,000
American dollars.

Whoever wins moves
on to the chance

to win 30,000
American dollars.

[ Normal voice ] Jameela, how do
you feel being in my spot?
I feel good.

I also really sympathize
with you guys.
This is terrifying.

[ High-pitched British accent ]
Okay. Let's get into the game.

Please, everyone direct your
attention to the Traumatron,

where my old chum Q received the
worst kind of tickle torture.

Q is definitely
afraid of spiders.

Q should have never
told us he's

deathly afraid of spiders.
-Oh! This is horrible.

Alright, bud, the rules
of the game are simple --

we're gonna put a spider on you
and then every time you move

we're gonna put
another spider on you.
Here we go.
No, no. Oh, my God.

-Oh, my God!
-That's the size of a kitten.

Please stop, please stop,
please stop.

Oh, I feel it
crawling on me.

Aah!
-Here comes his friend.

Murr: Aah!
[ Chuckles nervously ]

Oh, my God!
Oh, my God!

-God, get them off me.
-Oh, my God!

-Oh, my God!
-Oh, you moved your head again,

buddy,
what are you doing?

Oh!
-Oh, my God!

You have no idea
what this looks like.

-Oh!
-Ooh.
Yep.
Fun? Fun, Q?

No, not fun at all.
I'm deathly afraid of spiders.

When it was done, the crew took
me out for drinks afterwards.
It was horrible.

So, you're tortured
with spiders
is absolutely cray?

Sal, didn't we do
that same exact thing
with you and kittens?

-Yes, you did.
-Yup.

-And you can step on a spider.
-What kind of

cold, dead bastard
doesn't like kittens?

I'm sorry,
you're in my team now.

Oh, yeah, no, no, no.
Sorry. Sorry. yeah.

-The first thing you say is...
-Yeah, yeah, yeah.

...I'm a [British accent]
cold, dead bastard.
Yeah, bastard.

[ Chuckles ]
To Hell with kittens! Yuck!
Remember your three pillars.

How about --
What are they, Joe?

Yeah. [ Laughs ]
They are physical pain.

What was the second one?
Emotional, emotional --

[ Normal voice ]
They gave me the wrong ones.

You can take the boy
out of Long Island,

but you can't take
Long Island out of the boy.
Emotional trauma...
[ Audience oohs, laughter ]

[ High-pitched British accent ]
It's physical pain,

emotional trauma and long-term
psychological impact.
[ Cheers and applause ]
[ Indistinct ]
[ Laughter ]

Now, for
2,000 American dollars,

talk it through and lock
in where you think
you're tortured with spiders
lands on The Misery Index,

while I enjoy
a spot of tea.

[ Laughs ]
Oh, my God!
[ Cheers and applause ]

Hey, how come
I never get that?
Lock it in, get to playing.

Even if
you don't have a phobia,
I think you're still scared.

The word "torture"
is in the title.

Well, it has to be above 50.
I think it's above 60.

-Okay.
-Okay, we have to lock it in,

everyone.
-You think it's there?

-Lock it up.
-We're locked, we're locked.

We are locked. I think
you got it. You did great.

Jolly good,
everyone is locked in,

so let's see who wins
and who can bugger off.
We got it. We got it.
Krystal, you said 39.

-We did.
-We did, we --

-Yes, we did.
-Oh my God.
And, Lily, you said...

Whoa! You guys are obsessed
with 69 over there.

You guys
got to let it go.

Quite a difference
in opinions.

Yes.
Okay, let's see
what our shrinks said.

Sal:
Let's go! 54 and up, baby!
Come on! Come on!
[ Cheers and applause ]

Krystal wins, which means
we have to say ta-ta to Lily,

but Krystal is moving on where
she'll be playing for $30,000,
right after this.
